PickUpQuest.QuestName: To Boom or Not to Boom

UserDialog.Title: Note from Metrienne
UserDialog.Message: Use the Guard Disguise (located in your Mission Items), use the access panel, then press OK.

UserDialog.Title: Note from Metrienne
UserDialog.Message: Go down the auto-elevator, activate the console, go back up, then press OK.

TurnInQuest.QuestName: To Boom or Not to Boom

CompleteQuest.QuestName: To Boom or Not to Boom

UserDialog.Title: Note From Metrienne
UserDialog.Message: Walk up to Karrels Javis to initiate a conversation. Afterwards, kill him and press OK.
